languages.text: "Южная часть теневых кварталов изолирована из-за подозрений на вспышку каменной чумы. Нарушение карантина карается смертью на месте!"
"Southern Shadow Quarters quarantined on suspicion of stoneplague outbreak! Quarantine breakers will be executed on sight!"
languages.original_text: "Южная часть теневых кварталов изолирована из-за подозрений на вспышку каменной чумы. Нарушение карантина карается смертью на месте!"

traits.locale_text: "Southern Shadow Quarters quarantined on suspicion of stoneplague outbreak! Breach of quarantine punishable by immediate death!"
"Southern Shadow Quarters quarantined on suspicion of stoneplague outbreak! Breach of quarantine punishable by immediate death!"
"Southern Shadow Quarters quarantined on suspicion of stoneplague outbreak! Quarantine breakers will be executed on sight!"
"Southern Shadow Quarters quarantined on suspicion of stoneplague outbreak! Quarantine breakers will be executed on sight!"
"Southern Shadow Quarters quarantined on suspicion of stoneplague outbreak! Quarantine breakers will be executed on sight!"

languages.text: “我们怀疑阴影区南部爆发了石瘟，这片区域已经被隔离了！所有破坏隔离的人都当场处决！”
languages.original_text: "Southern Shadow Quarters quarantined on suspicion of stoneplague outbreak! Quarantine breakers will be executed on sight!"

traits.locale_text: “我们怀疑阴影区南部爆发了石瘟，这片区域已经被隔离了！所有破坏隔离的人都当场处决！”

languages.text: «¡Los barrios bajos del sur han sido confinados por sospechas de un brote de plaga pétrea! ¡Todo aquel que infrinja la cuarentena será ejecutado!».
languages.original_text: "Southern Shadow Quarters quarantined on suspicion of stoneplague outbreak! Quarantine breakers will be executed on sight!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Los barrios bajos del sur han sido confinados por sospechas de un brote de plaga pétrea! ¡Todo aquel que infrinja la cuarentena será ejecutado!».

languages.text: 「影の区画の南部、ストーンペストの発生が疑われ隔離中！隔離を破った者はその場で処刑される！」
languages.original_text: "Southern Shadow Quarters quarantined on suspicion of stoneplague outbreak! Quarantine breakers will be executed on sight!"

traits.locale_text: 「影の区画の南部、ストーンペストの発生が疑われ隔離中！隔離を破った者はその場で処刑される！」

languages.text: "Südliche Schattenquartiere wegen Verdacht auf Ausbruch der Steinseuche unter Quarantäne gestellt! Wer dagegen verstößt, wird sofort hingerichtet!"
languages.original_text: "Southern Shadow Quarters quarantined on suspicion of stoneplague outbreak! Quarantine breakers will be executed on sight!"

traits.locale_text: "Südliche Schattenquartiere wegen Verdacht auf Ausbruch der Steinseuche unter Quarantäne gestellt! Wer dagegen verstößt, wird sofort hingerichtet!"

languages.text: « La partie sud du Quartier des Ombres est mise en quarantaine suite à une possible épidémie de peste rocheuse ! Tout contrevenant sera exécuté à vue ! »
languages.original_text: "Southern Shadow Quarters quarantined on suspicion of stoneplague outbreak! Quarantine breakers will be executed on sight!"

traits.locale_text: « La partie sud du Quartier des Ombres est mise en quarantaine suite à une possible épidémie de peste rocheuse ! Tout contrevenant sera exécuté à vue ! »

languages.text: "Güney Gölge Mahalli, taş vebası salgını şüphesiyle karantina altına alındı! Karantinayı aşmaya çalışanlar sorgusuz sualsiz infaz edilecektir!"
languages.original_text: "Southern Shadow Quarters quarantined on suspicion of stoneplague outbreak! Quarantine breakers will be executed on sight!"

traits.locale_text: "Güney Gölge Mahali, taş vebası salgını şüphesiyle karantina altına alındı! Karantinayı aşmaya çalışanlar sorgusuz sualsiz infaz edilecektir!"
